author: Special Correspondent
text:
Ambasamudram police have arrested a woman along with two of her relatives for allegedly strangulating her son to death.

The police said that Esakkiappan (35), a cobbler from Velayutham Nagar under Ambasamudram police station limits, murdered his father Murugan two years ago as the latter refused to apportion their ancestral property. He was arrested, and later enlarged on bail. When he started torturing his mother Rosapoo demanding the property, the woman with the help of her relatives Mookkandi and Chandran strangulated Esakkiappan to death on Friday.
title: Man killed by mother, relatives
